trans-unit.source: Provides properties and methods to add a license to a component and to manage a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ger egenskaper och metoder för att lägga till en licens till en komponent och hantera en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen kan inte ärvas.

trans-unit.source: The LicenseManager class provides the following `static` properties: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.UsageMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Klassen LicenseManager innehåller följande `static` egenskaper: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>och <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.UsageMode%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.UsageMode%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The class also provides the following `static` methods: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Klassen innehåller också följande `static` metoder: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>, och <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a component that you want to license, you must do the following: 1.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en komponent som du vill licens, måste du göra följande: 1.

trans-unit.source: Specify the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider> by marking the component with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Ange <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>genom att markera komponent med en <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> in the constructor of the component.
trans-unit.target: Anropa <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>i konstruktorn för komponenten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> throws a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when it tries to create an instance without a valid license.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>genererar en <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>när den försöker att skapa en instans utan en giltig licens.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException></xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>Inget genereras ett undantag.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> on any license that is granted when the component is disposed or finalized.
trans-unit.target: Anropa <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A>för en licens som beviljas när komponenten har tagits bort eller slutförd.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om licensiering finns [så här: licens komponenter och kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified type, given a context in which you can use the licensed instance.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en instans av den angivna typen utifrån en kontext som du kan använda den licensierade instansen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> you specify as the `creationContext` parameter is used as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> for the life of this <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>du anger som den `creationContext` parametern används som <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>för denna <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: The CreateWithContext method blocks all other threads in the <xref:System.AppDomain> from modifying the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>, allowing CreateWithContext to behave as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateWithContext blockerar alla andra trådar den <xref:System.AppDomain>från att modifiera den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>, vilket gör att CreateWithContext fungerar som en atomisk åtgärd.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to create.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerar typen för att skapa.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> that specifies when you can use the licensed instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> som anger när du kan använda den licensierade instansen.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: En instans av den angivna typen.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified type with the specified arguments, given a context in which you can use the licensed instance.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en instans av den angivna typen med de angivna argumenten utifrån en kontext som du kan använda den licensierade instansen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> you specify as the `creationContext` parameter is used as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> for the life of this <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>du anger som den `creationContext` parametern används som <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>för denna <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks all other threads in the <xref:System.AppDomain> from modifying the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>, allowing <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A> to behave as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden blockerar alla andra trådar den <xref:System.AppDomain>från att modifiera den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>, så att <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A>fungerar som en atomisk åtgärd.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to create.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerar typen för att skapa.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> that specifies when you can use the licensed instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> som anger när du kan använda den licensierade instansen.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Object> that represents the arguments for the type.
trans-unit.target: En matris av typen <xref:System.Object>som representerar argumenten för typen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the specified type with the given array of arguments.
trans-unit.target: En instans av den angivna typen med den angivna matrisen med argument.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref>, which specifies when you can use the licensed object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger aktuellt <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref>, vilket innebär att när du kan använda objektet licensierade.

trans-unit.source: When the user requests a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>, the user must give the context in which the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> is valid to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: När användaren begär en giltig <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>, användaren måste uppge kontexten där den <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>får den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> returned by this property should be passed to all <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider> classes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>som returneras av den här egenskapen ska skickas till alla <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>klasser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> that specifies when you can use the licensed object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> som anger när du kan använda objektet licensierade.

trans-unit.source: The CurrentContext property is currently locked and cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: CurrentContext-egenskapen är låst och kan inte ändras.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the given type has a valid license.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar om den angivna typen har en giltig licens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to find a valid license for.
trans-unit.target: För <xref:System.Type>att hitta en giltig licens efter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the given type is licensed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den angivna typen är licensierad; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a valid license can be granted for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Anger om du kan bevilja en giltig licens för den angivna typen.

trans-unit.source: The IsValid method returns `true` when the type is either not licensed, or is licensed and the license is valid.
trans-unit.target: IsValid-metoden returnerar `true` när typen licensieras inte eller är licensierad och licensen är giltig.

trans-unit.source: This method does not throw a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when it cannot grant a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden genereras inget ett <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>när den går inte att bevilja en giltig <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> method throws exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>metoden utlöser undantag.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of object that requests the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerar typen av objekt som begär den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a valid license can be granted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om en giltig licens kan beviljas; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a valid license can be granted for the specified instance of the type.
trans-unit.target: Anger om du kan bevilja en giltig licens för den angivna instansen av typen.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden skapar en giltig <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> method returns `true` when the `type` parameter is not licensed, or when it is licensed and the `license` parameter is valid.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>metoden returnerar `true` när den `type` parameter är inte licensierad eller när den är licensierad och `license` parametern är giltig.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method does not throw a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when it cannot grant a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden genereras inget ett <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>när den går inte att bevilja en giltig <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> method throws exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>metoden utlöser undantag.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `license` parameter is not `null` after this call, the object asking for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> must dispose of the license by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> method when the object is disposed of or finalized.
trans-unit.target: Om den `license` parametern är inte `null` efter det här anropet objektet ber om en <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>måste avyttra licensen genom att anropa den <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A>metoden när objektet avyttras eller slutförd.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of object that requests the license.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerar typen av objekt som kräver licensen.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An object of the specified type or a type derived from the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Ett objekt av den angivna typen eller en typ som härleds från den angivna typen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref> that is a valid license, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a valid license cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref> som är en giltig licens eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om det går inte att bevilja en giltig licens.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref> can be granted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om ett giltigt <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref> kan vara beviljade, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Prevents changes being made to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> of the given object.
trans-unit.target: Förhindrar ändringar i aktuellt <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> av angivet objekt.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> to get the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> of an object.
trans-unit.target: Använd den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>att hämta den <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>för ett objekt.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: This method locks the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>, preventing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> from being retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden låser den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>, förhindra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>hämtas.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: The object whose current context you want to lock.
trans-unit.target: Objekt vars kontext som du vill låsa.

trans-unit.source: The context is already locked.
trans-unit.target: Kontexten är redan låst.

trans-unit.source: Allows changes to be made to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> of the given object.
trans-unit.target: Gör ändringar till aktuellt <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> av angivet objekt.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> to get the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> of an object.
trans-unit.target: Använd den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>att hämta den <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>för ett objekt.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: This method unlocks the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>, allowing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden låser upp det <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>, så att den <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>som ska hämtas.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: The object whose current context you want to unlock.
trans-unit.target: Objekt vars kontext som du vill låsa upp.

trans-unit.source: contextUser represents a different user than the one specified in a previous call to .
trans-unit.target: contextUserrepresenterar en annan användare än den som angetts i ett tidigare anrop till .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode"></xref> which specifies when you can use the licensed object for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode"> </xref> som anger när du kan använda objektet licensierad för <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>

trans-unit.source: If this property cannot find a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> value, it returns <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode>.
trans-unit.target: Om den här egenskapen inte kan hitta ett <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>värde, returneras <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode"></xref> values, as specified in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*> property.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode"> </xref> värden som anges i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a license can be granted for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Anger om du kan bevilja en licens för den angivna typen.

trans-unit.source: This method throws a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden genererar en <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>när en giltig <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>går inte att bevilja.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>metoden inte utlösa ett undantag.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of object that requests the license.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerar typen av objekt som kräver licensen.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref> cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref> inte beviljas.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a license can be granted for the instance of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Anger om du kan bevilja en licens för instansen av den angivna typen.

trans-unit.source: This method throws a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden genererar en <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>när en giltig <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>går inte att bevilja.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>metoden inte utlösa ett undantag.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: All objects asking for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> must dispose of the license by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> method when the object is disposed of or finalized.
trans-unit.target: Alla objekt som ber om en <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>måste avyttra licensen genom att anropa den <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A>metoden när objektet avyttras eller slutförd.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of object that requests the license.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerar typen av objekt som kräver licensen.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> of the specified type or a type derived from the specified type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>angiven typ eller av en typ som härleds från den angivna typen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type is licensed, but a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref> cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: Typen är licensierad, men en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref> inte beviljas.
